source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SEQ_00<tab>Brother E<var 1F /var>Sumi<var 1F /var>Yan requires your assistance in a matter concerning the young conjurer, Sylphie.
target: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SEQ_00<tab>幻術士ギルドマスター、エ・スミ・ヤンは、冒険者に、シルフィーに関する依頼があるようだ。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SEQ_01<tab>After disappearing from the guild without a word, Sylphie was later spotted by a party of conjurers in the South Shroud. Brother E<var 1F /var>Sumi has requested that you travel to the area and escort the wayward child back to Gridania. Speak first with Wulfiue in Buscarron's Druthers to learn more of the young conjurer's present state of mind.
target: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SEQ_01<tab>エ・スミ・ヤンから、南部森林にて目撃された、シルフィーの様子を確かめてほしいと依頼された。南部森林の酒房「バスカロンドラザーズ」にいる、「ウルフュー」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SEQ_02<tab>Wulfiue has explained that Sylphie, with her sensitivity to the voices of the elementals, must be troubled by the powerful disturbance discovered to the southeast of Buscarron's Druthers. Speak with Sylphie and see how she fares.
target: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SEQ_02<tab>南部森林の酒房「バスカロンドラザーズ」にいる、「シルフィー」に声をかけてみよう。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SEQ_03<tab>Upon reading her mother's journal, Sylphie has become convinced that conjury is to blame for inciting the wrath of nature. Fearing that the party of Hearers sent to cleanse the corruption are further angering the Twelveswood, the young conjurer sets off to stop them. Catch up to Sylphie before she stumbles into danger.
target: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SEQ_03<tab>シルフィーは、自然は恐ろしいものだという母の考えに同調していた。一方、淀みを浄化する幻術士部隊の活動が森の怒りを引き起こしていることを感知したシルフィーは、止めるために、飛び出してしまった。シルフィーの後を追いかけよう。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SEQ_04<tab>With a helping hand from nature, you have managed to cleanse the massive manifestation of corrupted earth. Speak with Sylphie and learn what the young conjurer is thinking.
target: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SEQ_04<tab>自然の力を借りて、巨大な土の淀みを浄化することができた。シルフィーと話してみよう。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SEQ_05<tab>After witnessing the battle, Sylphie has conceded that perhaps nature is not as frightening as she believed. Return to Stillglade Fane and report to Brother E<var 1F /var>Sumi.
target: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SEQ_05<tab>シルフィーは、幻術士ギルドに帰ってくることになった。幻術士ギルドのエ・スミ・ヤンに報告しよう。

source:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SEQ_06<tab>Having learned of her mother's honest, though misguided, motivations, Sylphie is now determined to embrace the power of nature. At long last, the young conjurer seems to have put her personal troubles behind her. The general mood of hope is dampened, however, by the revelation that the Twelveswood is suffering from some widespread and as-yet-unknown affliction. Return to your studies and seek greater mastery over your art in preparation for the day when Brother E<var 1F /var>Sumi calls upon you once more.

※The next conjurer quest will be available from E<var 1F /var>Sumi<var 1F /var>Yan upon reaching level 30.
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SEQ_06<tab>母親の本当の願いを知り、自然を学ぶことを決意したシルフィー。幻術士の目覚めとは対照的に、森には淀みが散見され、何やら異変が起きているようだ。冒険者の力を必要とする時が来るかもしれないと言うエ・スミ・ヤン。来るべき時に備え、いっそう幻術の鍛錬に励もう。

※幻術士のレベルが30以上になると、エ・スミ・ヤンから次の幻術士クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Wulfiue at Buscarron's Druthers.
target: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_TODO_00<tab>酒房「バスカロンドラザーズ」のウルフューと話す

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Sylphie.
target: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_TODO_01<tab>酒房「バスカロンドラザーズ」のシルフィーと話す

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_TODO_02<tab>Chase after Sylphie.
target: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_TODO_02<tab>シルフィーを追いかける

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Sylphie.
target: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_TODO_03<tab>シルフィーと話す

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_TODO_04<tab>Report to Brother E<var 1F /var>Sumi<var 1F /var>Yan at Stillglade Fane.
target: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_TODO_04<tab>幻術士ギルドのエ・スミ・ヤンに報告

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_1<tab>Welcome, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. The tales of your deeds reach me even here in the cloistered heart of Stillglade Fane.
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_1<tab>よく来ましたね。
あなたが各地で活躍しているという噂が
この幻術士ギルドまで届いてきていますよ。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_2<tab>Glad I am that you have come, for I would ask your assistance in a matter of some delicacy. It concerns, yes, young Sylphie once again...
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_2<tab>ひとつ、依頼を聞いていただけますか？
もちろん、シルフィーのことです。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_3<tab>As you can no doubt imagine, the recent revelations concerning her mother have sorely troubled the poor child.
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_3<tab>彼女は、先日の修行を終えて以来、
母親への信頼と不信がせめぎあい
ずいぶん悩んでいたようで……。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_4<tab>It appears Sylphie needed some time alone to sort through the whirlwind of emotions which now beset her. She has, in short, fled from the guild.
target: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_4<tab>姿を消してしまったのです……。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_5<tab>Fortunately, a party of conjurers who were dispatched to the South Shroud to investigate another instance of corruption sent word that they have spotted our wayward Sylphie.
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_5<tab>しかし、ある浄化作戦で派遣された幻術士隊から
待機先で、シルフィーを見かけた
という連絡がありました。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_6<tab>Considering the importance of their mission, I would not seek to distract the conjurers from their task. Thus, I turn to you to escort Sylphie back here to the guild. You are, I believe, one of the few people to whom she will listen.
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_6<tab>そこで、シルフィーを連れ戻していただきたいのです。
隊は任務がありますし、シルフィーも
あなたには心を開いていますから。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_7<tab>Pray travel to Buscarron's Druthers and speak with Wulfiue. She was the conjurer who first chanced upon Sylphie, and will be able to tell you more of how the young lady fares.
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_7<tab>シルフィーを目撃したのは、「ウルフュー」です。
南部森林の酒房「バスカロンドラザーズ」にて
待機していますので、彼女から話を聞いてください。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_WULFIUE_000_21<tab>We meet again, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I assume Brother E<var 1F /var>Sumi warned you of the corruption my companions and I have been tasked with purifying here in the South Shroud?
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_WULFIUE_000_21<tab>また、お会いしましたね。
付近で、巨大な淀みが発生していて
われわれが浄化隊として派遣されたのです。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_WULFIUE_000_22<tab>The source of this extensive blight is found to the southeast─the shrill, discordant voices of the elementals shriek their dismay in the vicinity of the withered treant. I suggest you give the area a wide berth.
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_WULFIUE_000_22<tab>ここから南東にあるトレントの死骸の付近で
異常な精霊の声を察知しています。
危険ですから、くれぐれも近づかないようにしてください。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_WULFIUE_000_23<tab>Considering the potential dangers, you might imagine how alarmed I was to discover young Sylphie wandering about this part of the Twelveswood. It seems that her mother─a woman who healed with conjury, but remained untrained by the guild─called this region her home.
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_WULFIUE_000_23<tab>ここで、姿を消したシルフィーを見つけた時は驚きました。
なんでもこの地は、幻術士ギルドに属さず治癒の幻術を
扱ったという彼女の母の故郷だったのだそうです。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_WULFIUE_000_24<tab>Sylphie herself had her head buried in some manner of tome, but if she is as sensitive to the elementals' murmurings as I am led to believe, then the din within her mind must be driving her to distraction.
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_WULFIUE_000_24<tab>シルフィーはずっと何かを熱心に読んでいるのですが
彼女もまた、精霊の声をよく聞くと聞いています。
現状の精霊の声は、さぞや耳障りでしょう。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_WULFIUE_000_25<tab>Pray speak with the child and see that she is well. I would do so myself if our current duty were not so pressing. We will, in fact, be setting out at any moment.
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_WULFIUE_000_25<tab>ぜひとも、様子を見てきてください。
任務がなければ、私が声をかけるのですが
そろそろ出発ですので、後はよろしくお願いいたします。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_NOLANEL_000_26<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you have grown much since last we spoke of the mysteries of earth. Though you are no doubt capable of defending yourself, I must nonetheless advise you against venturing out into the wilds until such time as balance has been restored.
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_NOLANEL_000_26<tab>お久しぶりです、ずいぶんと成長しましたね。
とはいえ、今、この辺りは不安定な状態ですから、
出歩かない方が、身のためですよ。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_JOACIN_000_27<tab>Wulfiue divines the will of air, Nolanel is deeply rooted in earth, and I claim some small degree of mastery over water. False modesty aside, that we three were chosen to respond to this disturbance suggests that the situation is dire indeed.
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_JOACIN_000_27<tab>こたびの作戦にあたって、
各属性を得意とする幻術士が集められました。
事態は、それほど深刻ということです。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_WULFIUE_000_30<tab>We are soon to depart on our mission. I am, however, relieved to know that you are here to speak with Sylphie and safeguard her well-being.
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_WULFIUE_000_30<tab>私たちは、そろそろ出発ですので、
シルフィーのことを、よろしくお願いいたしますね。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_040<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!? Ah, I should've known that Wulfiue would tattle on me! And Brother E<var 1F /var>Sumi sent you to take me back, didn't he?
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_040<tab>あ……<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>！
ウルフューが告げ口したのね……
エ・スミ様に言われて、連れ戻しに来たの？

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_041<tab>This is where my mother used to live, you know. Right up until she...passed on, folk were grateful for the healing she offered.
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_041<tab>お母さんは、死ぬ直前までここで人を治療していたの。
たくさんの人から感謝されてたのよ。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_042<tab>And this is the journal she used to keep. There's an entry that explains how nature becomes furious when conjurers use their art; how there are always more people wounded in battles when “mortals abuse the power that is not theirs to take.”
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_042<tab>これは、お母さんが毎日つけていた治療記録よ。
戦いが起きて、幻術士が幻術を使うと
自然が怒って、けが人が増えるって書いてあったわ。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_043<tab>My mother refused to draw on nature, because she was scared of making it angry.
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_043<tab>お母さんが自然の力を借りなかったのは、
自然を恐れたから……怒らせないようにしたかったんだよ。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_044<tab>She wouldn't lie about such things, and I want to do what she would've wanted. I'm going to stop using conjury altogether!
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_044<tab>私、やっぱりお母さんを信じる。
もう自然の力は借りない。
幻術なんて……やめる！

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_45<tab>Unnngh... I've never heard the voices this mad before.
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_45<tab>うう……
今までに、感じたことのない自然の怒り……

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_46<tab>I bet it's because Wulfiue and the others are overusing their art. We have to go and stop them!
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_46<tab>きっと、ウルフューたちが
幻術を使いすぎているせいだわ……
止めにいきましょう！！

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_39<tab>Gods, it's so loud... Can't you hear it? Nature is shrieking in rage...
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_39<tab>ああ……恐ろしい……
あなたには、聞こえないの……？
自然の怒りが、爆発したような声が……。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_NOLANEL_000_050<tab>Never has the earth so confounded me... I must apologize.
target: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_NOLANEL_000_050<tab>土の使い手なのに、すいません……。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_WULFIUE_000_051<tab>Thank you for your timely assistance. With the origin of the corruption now neutralized, we should be able to cleanse whatever traces remain.
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_WULFIUE_000_051<tab>ありがとうございました。
後のことは、私たちでなんとかしておきます。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_JOACIN_000_052<tab>You possess quite an affinity for the elements... That was most impressive.
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_JOACIN_000_052<tab>自然が、あれほど協力してくれるとは……
さすがですね。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_60<tab>I... I can't believe nature actually helped us.
target: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_60<tab>自然が力を貸してくれるなんて……。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_61<tab>There was nothing scary about it at all.
target: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_61<tab>自然は、本当は怖くないんだね。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_62<tab>I might still wonder if it really was safe for conjurers to borrow that power if I hadn't seen the way you wield it. Nothing could seem more...natural. I think it's time I went back to the guild.
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_62<tab>でも、幻術士は、本当に自然の力を借りていいのかな……？
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>といれば、
答えがわかる気がするから私……幻術士ギルドに帰ります！

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_63<tab>There are a few things I need to collect first, so, please, go on ahead without me.
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_63<tab>私は、荷物をまとめてから帰るから、
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>は
先にギルドへ戻ってて。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_81<tab>Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. And you also, Sylphie.
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_81<tab>おかえりなさい、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
それと……シルフィー。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_82<tab>Brother E<var 1F /var>Sumi, I'm sorry I ran away like that...
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_82<tab>エ・スミ様、
心配をおかけして、ごめんなさい。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_83<tab>I understand, child. Did you find the answers you sought?
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_83<tab>いいのです。
何か、知ることはできましたか？

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_84<tab>Yes─thanks to <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> showed me that nature was nothing to be afraid of.
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_84<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>が……
自然は怖くないってことを、見せてくれました。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_85<tab>...I think I know why my mother refused to call upon its power─she believed the act caused suffering to nature itself.
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_85<tab>もしかすると、お母さんが自然の力を借りなかったのは
苦しむ自然を守りたかったのかもしれません。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_86<tab>I see.
target: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_86<tab>……なるほど。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_87<tab>So it was her very love for nature that prevented her from drawing on its strength.
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_87<tab>自然の声をよく聞く、あなたのお母さんも
自然を愛していたのですね……。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_88<tab>Tell me, Sylphie─has the fog of indecision now lifted from your mind?
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_88<tab>シルフィー。
あなたの決意を惑わせていた霧は、晴れましたか？

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_89<tab>It has, Guildmaster. I understand now why my mother chose the path she did.
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_89<tab>……はい！
お母さんは、自然を嫌いじゃなかったんだって。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_90<tab>Full glad am I to hear that, for I must ask of you one more question.
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_90<tab>良い返事です。
もうひとつ、尋ねさせてください。
……あなた自身のことです。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_91<tab>Yes, Brother E<var 1F /var>Sumi?
target: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_91<tab>私自身のこと？

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_92<tab>When you first witnessed <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> cleanse a corrupted element, you mentioned hearing voices. How exactly did they sound?
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_92<tab>以前、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>が淀みを鎮めた時、
「声」が聞こえたといっていましたね。
あれは、どのように聞こえたのですか？

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_93<tab>The voices? Well...they sounded joyful, like a crowd letting out a sudden cheer. I really heard them, I swear!
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_93<tab>ええと……
ほ、本当に、聞こえたんです。
嬉しい！　って叫ぶみたいな、歓声が……

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_94<tab>I am sure you did, Sylphie. This is a gift.
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_94<tab>疑っているのではありませんよ、シルフィー。
それは、あなたの才能です。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_95<tab>Conjurers may sense the power of nature, and borrow from its strength. But not all can hear its whispers.
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_95<tab>幻術士は自然を感じ、力を借りる。
ですが「声」を聞くことはできません。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_96<tab>What you describe are the voices of the elementals. You may very well possess the talent to become a Hearer.
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_96<tab>それは、精霊の声。
あなたには、私たちと同じ
「道士」になる才能があるのかもしれません。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_97<tab>A <var 1A 02 /var>Hearer<var 1A 01 /var>!?
target: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_SYLPHIE_000_97<tab>……！

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_98<tab>Of course, much relies on your studies of conjury. You have a natural aptitude, but have thus far lacked commitment. You must not neglect your training, Sylphie.
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_98<tab>もちろん、きちんと幻術を学べばですけどね。
あなたは才能はあるが、少々根気に欠ける。
修行を放り出してはいけませんよ。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_99<tab>Putting aside such matters for a moment, I am curious to hear about the disturbance you observed in the South Shroud, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I assume from the reports I have received that it was of a different magnitude to those which you have previously encountered. Am I correct?
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_99<tab>……そういえば、
南部森林で鎮めた「淀み」は、
今までのものとは違って巨大だと報告をうけています。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_100<tab>Hmmm... This bodes ill. The creatures known as “mud pies” are not native to the Twelveswood. I wonder what relation this may have to the seemingly ever-increasing frequency of these disturbances.
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_100<tab>「マッドパイ・プリンセス」……。
黒衣森にいるはずのない魔物です。
近頃「淀み」の報告が多いことと、関係があるのでしょうか。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_101<tab>Something beyond the damage wrought by the Calamity afflicts the Twelveswood. I shall commune with the elementals and seek to identify this threat.
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_101<tab>森に何かが起きているのかもしれません。
精霊たちに尋ね、調べておきましょう。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_102<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Sylphie, I may have need of you both before long. Until then, give yourselves over to the study of our art.
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_102<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、シルフィー。
あなたたちの力を必要とするかもしれません。
しっかりと鍛錬を積んでおいてください。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_103<tab>Ever shall the earth meet your footfall, and the wind guide your path.
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_ESUMIYAN_000_103<tab>自然は私たちと共にある。
その意味を、お忘れなきように。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_POP_MESSAGE<tab>You sense a hostile presence!
target: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_POP_MESSAGE<tab>敵の気配を感じた！！

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>Purify the corrupted earth!
target: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>土の淀みを浄化しろ！

source:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_QIB_001_SYLPHIE_BATTLETALK_01<tab>Nature is angry with us...
You mustn't use any more conjury!
target: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_QIB_001_SYLPHIE_BATTLETALK_01<tab>自然が怒っている……幻術を……自然の力をこれ以上使わないで！

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_QIB_001_SYLPHIE_BATTLETALK_02<tab>We are only making nature more furious!
target: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_QIB_001_SYLPHIE_BATTLETALK_02<tab>自然の怒りが、どんどん増していく……！

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_QIB_001_SYLPHIE_BATTLETALK_03<tab>Even the creatures of the woods know this is wrong!
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_QIB_001_SYLPHIE_BATTLETALK_03<tab>トレントや野生の動物まで……！
自然を恐れて、止めに来たんだわ！

source:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_QIB_001_SYLPHIE_BATTLETALK_04<tab>Now nature sends thunder and lightning against us!
What more proof do you need!
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_QIB_001_SYLPHIE_BATTLETALK_04<tab>雷が……自然が怒ってるせいだわ！
もう、自然の力を使うのはやめて！

source:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_QIB_001_SYLPHIE_BATTLETALK_05<tab>Elementals!? Are they angry too!?
We're really in trouble now!
target:
TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_QIB_001_SYLPHIE_BATTLETALK_05<tab>精霊……！？　怒って姿を現したの……！？
ああっ、今からもっと恐ろしい事が起きてしまうわ！！

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_QIB_001_SYLPHIE_BATTLETALK_06<tab>They... The elementals are helping us!?
target: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_QIB_001_SYLPHIE_BATTLETALK_06<tab>え……精霊が、力を貸してくれているの……！？

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_QIB_001_NOLANEL_BATTLETALK_01<tab>Never has the earth so confounded me...
target: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_QIB_001_NOLANEL_BATTLETALK_01<tab>土の使い手なのに、すいません……

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_QIB_001_WULFIUE_BATTLETALK_01<tab>I can muster no second wind...
target: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_QIB_001_WULFIUE_BATTLETALK_01<tab>もう……ダメです……。

source: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_QIB_001_JOACIN_BATTLETALK_01<tab>My well has run dry...
target: TEXT_CLSCNJ005_00440_QIB_001_JOACIN_BATTLETALK_01<tab>こんなところで……。
